item.title: Posting to LinkedIn and Bluesky programmatically
item.description:
Background

Whenever I have something to share with the world (mainly technical content), I post it on social media so that other people can also check it out. I usually post about articles and books that I’ve read, new blogposts that I’ve written, and discounts on my book. The two social media platforms I was using until now were LinkedIn and X (former Twitter). But it’s time to replace X with something else, for administrative purposes…
